HomePageComponent.body:
Welcome to the NVIDIA Marketing Assets Portal

From this site, you can download marketing tools for NVIDIA Tegra. Assets include logos, messaging, email and web page templates, game screenshots, videos and more. Use these assets to create campaigns for Super Phones and Tablets powered by NVIDIA Tegra.

To Begin: Click on the Libraries Tab in the navigation bar at the top.

Email for your NVIDIA account rep for any questions or problems using this portal.
